attributes.additional_details:
These facilities often have low levels of animal welfare and the animals trapped inside have an extremely poor quality of life.
 
As a nation that claims to have some of the highest animal welfare standards in the world, we should ban this industrial style of farming and make factory farms illegal.
attributes.background: Around 80% of the UK’s farms are now intensive factory farms.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
